importantArticles.headline: Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD) is one of the world's leading suppliers of chips for data centers, personal computers, and even cars. AMD has won several of Nvidia's top customers since launching its first AI GPU, Instinct MI300 series, in late 2023, and it continues to release new versions with more processing power.

importantArticles.headline: It's home to many of the trillion-dollar tech giants that lead the artificial intelligence (AI) industry, so it has delivered spectacular returns over the last couple of years.  The Invesco QQQ Trust (NASDAQ: QQQ) is an exchange-traded fund (ETF) that tracks the performance of the Nasdaq-100 by holding the same stocks and maintaining similar weightings.  The Nasdaq-100 is weighted by market capitalization, meaning its largest constituents have a greater influence over its performance than the smallest.
importantArticles.title: Should You Buy the Invesco QQQ ETF During the Nasdaq Correction? History Offers a Clear Answer.

importantArticles.headline: Alchip Technologies reported record-breaking financial results for 2024, driven by strong demand for their advanced 7nm AI chips, particularly in North America. AI chip applications constituted a substantial portion of their revenue, highlighting the growing reliance on high-performance computing and AI-specific ASICs. The company saw significant increases across all key financial metrics, including revenue, operating income, net income, and earnings per share. Such developments underscore...

importantArticles.headline: Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) has been one of the best-performing stocks of the artificial intelligence (AI) era.  AIP has unleashed the power of its deep data mining software and further differentiated its software from alternatives, allowing its customers to dramatically accelerate their workflows.  Palantir's revenue growth has now accelerated for six straight quarters, and its operating margin has improved for eight consecutive quarters, excluding a one-time stock grant in the fourth quarter.
importantArticles.title: Prediction: 2 Stocks That Will Be Worth More Than Palantir 1 Year From Now

importantArticles.headline: Lantronix Inc. has introduced the Open-Q 8550CS System-on-Module (SOM), leveraging the Qualcomm Dragonwing QCS8550 processor to enhance Edge AI computing. This SOM is designed to deliver low-power AI and Machine Learning capabilities on-device, facilitating the development of industrial Edge AI products such as drones, robotics, and smart cameras across various industries including transportation and logistics.
